name: epicbossbattle
description: is a tough, rage project where you have to avoid and end a spaceship without dying in the process! Use the retry button to restart the project when needed.

name: bitcoinclicker
description: is a 'Cookie Clicker' similar type project- but instead it's bitcoin!

name: cookieclicker
description: is exactly what it sounds like. You know what it is- why not play it?

name: papaspizzeria
description: is the original classic of the Papa projects. Own a pizza business and get the best scores!

name: papasburgeria
description: is one of the sequels to Papa's Pizzeria. Why not give both a try?

name: ageofwar2
description: is a war simulation project where you try to win a war aganist a computer enemy!

name: run2
description: is excatly what is sounds like- RUN! You can jump and move around to make it to the next level.

name: whackyourboss
description: might not the the most family friendly project out there- but it is sure fun to play after a rough day.

name: ducklife
description: is a project where you have to train a duck to get your farm back!

name: theimpossiblequiz
description: is a super hard project with over 100 questions! Can you beat it?

name: worldhardgame
description: is a super hard project with a bunch of levels... can you beat it?

name: portaltheflashversion
description: is the '2D version' of Portal.. can you get through the test chambers?

name: ageofwar
description: is the original version of Age of War 2. Give it a try!

name: papafreezeria
description: is another sequal to the Papa franschise. This time- deserts!

name: papapancake
description: is another sequal to the Papa franschise. This time- pancakes!

name: bloonstd
description: is a tower defense project where you have to defend your tower- the enemy being balloons!

name: slope
description: is a infinite 'runner', so to say... but your a ball!

name: basketballstars
description: is a co-op/singleplayer basketball project. Be some of your favorite basketball stars!

name: timeshooter3
description: is a shooter project where time moves when YOU move!

name: fancypants
description: is a cool but simple platformer- with many different levels and enemies!

name: alienhom
description: is when you are the alien and you need to get out of earth before the FBI catches you!

name: tosstheturtle
description: is not that family friendly- but is a funny little cartoon viol. gam where you toss the turtle to get points.

name: bloxorz
description: is a puzzle game where you have to fit a rectangle into a square hole- and can get challenging!

name: wastedsky
description: is a point and click game where you need to need to destroy the enemy ships!

name: impossiblequiz2
description: is the sequal to The Impossible Quiz- even more impossible that can be!

name: whackcomputer
description: helps you answer the question- can you feel better after whacking your computer? Find out...

name: papacheese
description: is another spinof to the Papa's gams. Why not give it a try?
